perturbation.original_text:
Oceanic Time Warner Cable will include the following disclaimer on the Watchit Content: “The materials shown are for entertainment purposes only
and does not provide any guarantees of winning or improving your odds of winning on this program. The rules of the games as shown may not
apply to all properties and may change from time to time.”
perturbation.changed_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will provide Watchit with data on viewership to both Channel 777 and specifically to the content provided by Watchit.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates a specific disclaimer regarding the entertainment-only nature of the content. Moving this disclaimer into the section describing data sharing makes it less prominent and harder to find, potentially misleading viewers about the content's purpose and any disclaimers.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Consumer Protection Laws regarding clear and conspicuous disclaimers, particularly concerning gambling-related content.
perturbation.location: Original Location: Before last paragraph, New Location: Before last paragraph

perturbation.original_text:
Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under
the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
perturbation.changed_text:

the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'exclusive' from the right to sell third-party advertising introduces ambiguity, potentially leading to disputes over advertising rights and reducing clarity in enforcing Watchit's control over ad revenue.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law regarding clarity and unambiguous terms.
